abstract: Korea Development Bank’s grand dream of breaking into the league of top global banks seems to have gotten harder to achieve, after its bid for an international foray was scuttled this week.
snippet: Korea Development Bank’s grand dream of breaking into the league of top global banks seems to have gotten harder to achieve, after its bid for an international foray was scuttled this week.
lead_paragraph: Korea Development Bank‘s grand dream of breaking into the league of top global banks seems to have gotten harder to achieve, after its bid for an international foray was scuttled this week, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Korean Bank Steps Back From Global Ambitions
